website_summaries.verdict: This decoy, which has a quiet setup, attracts deer with its realistic features.
pros: The metal stake does a great job of holding this decoy in place
Has a movable head and a soft tail, which triggers with even a small breeze
cons: Smaller than other buck decoys on the market
Some adjustments might need to be made to the head in order to get it to move freely in the wind

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Bought same model 2 years ago and it was fine. Would have returned but 3 days left in hunt and I needed it. Head/neck is same size as earlier purchase but hole it fits in is at least 3/4" too small. Spent an hour or so with box cutter making it work. Even worse, the finish is glossy-older one is flat grey. Scared the sh... out of the first two bucks to see it. NOT downwind , so scent was not the issue. They just ran off snorting as soon as they got within good visual range on two different setups. First shiny deer they ever saw, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Wags

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my friend for hunting and when I put it together I loved it so much that I placed it in my living Room next to my Christmas tree here's a photo. The product is made of the highest quality. And so easy to put together you don't need to read instructions. I buy a large one and a small 1 but as you can see turn hot very small you could easily put them outside in the yard for the holidays. I want to buy more to put them on my front door area. You won't be disappointed. If I could I would give them a 10 star.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona BackBone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. read the reviews of other people about shaving a little bit off on the bottom of the neck to help free it up to move. Also found that if you place it slightly downhill, the head it much more free to move. I also bought a little level (link below) and stick it on the under side of the deer to help with the leveling. I used a sharpie to darken the glass so light wouldn't catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boe

customer_reviews.title: Buck Decoy- my opinion is still up in the air
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use this with a Buck present yet, so I couldn't say if it does its intended job. Regarding a few other things: it is pretty light-weight and easy to assemble. A negative I found was that one of the antlers did not go in very easily and does not stay in well. I will report more if I can actually get a buck in the vicinity of the decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This decoy does everything its supposed to. I had an easy time positioning the deke to get head movement in a relatively light wind, just level the body out and the head will swing. The tail needed more wind to move, but all in all it looks good. I read that other users had problems with the stand breaking so I was really careful with it and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: charles g

customer_reviews.title: Great Decoy some deer just come out and eat right beside him.
customer_reviews.text: This buck really works hard and has taken a beating so great quality my only problem is with the carring case it doesn't secure the small major pieces and they fall out a lot going through the fields to set them up I had to back track for hours to find the stand there should be a better case to secure those very important pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product, a little loud to set up but otherwise not bad. As for bringing in bucks, it def works, at least during the rut which is when i first tried it. One buck-2.5 yr old came with feet of it challenging the decoy. Shortly after a 3.5 yr buck came running from across a cut bean field and circled downwind of the decoy. He took a good look at it and spooked. I can blame it on the decoy; the buck could’ve been scared and didn’t want the fight or could’ve caught my wind slightly, not sure. Either way it does the job. It will def take some experience for proper placement during archery hunts tho
customer_reviews.author: R Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not a very big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I would like this product so much more if they took the time to put more quality into it. The Clips, plastic and the stand seem to be cheaply made. I honestly can't see this product lasting over a dozen hunts without breaking. For the amount of money that you pay for this you would think you would get more quality.
customer_reviews.author: birdman

customer_reviews.title: Realistic decoration
customer_reviews.text: Love this guy. I only use him for a lawn decoration. He goes out on Dec 1st with bells and scarf and does not come in until after Easter when he is wearing his Easter Bonnet and egg necklace, Everyone waits for his arrival and they love how his head moves in the breeze. This is the 2nd one I bought. I had my first for 15 years....he finally needed too many organ transplants! The quality is great and looks so real!! Love him to bits.
customer_reviews.author: Hogan2000

customer_reviews.title: I was able to call in several small bucks to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to call in several small bucks to it. One even got close and licked it. It was extremely difficult to get the head on and into the body because the angle of the eyelet that the head hook goes into. I had to take pliers and bend it to get it together and then be able to remove it without tools in the field...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Jessica Wills

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfectly sized
customer_reviews.text: Took about 5 minutes to put together. The tail is awesome but the head does not move much. I think I need to do as others have and grind the neck a touch where it's rubbing. During the rut does are a little scared fearing they will be chased again. Smaller bucks are very inquisitive and big bucks, well we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Head doesn’t float as described. Plastic in the neck area seems out of shape for head to wobble in the wind. I knelt on the neck area to make it more of a football shape. Worked for about 5 mins. Plastic just goes back..
customer_reviews.author: tiggin69

customer_reviews.title: Good looking decoy
customer_reviews.text: Decoy looks good, but head/neck is hard to attach especially in the dark. A handle cut into the belly would make carrying assembled much easier. I used it 4 times in two different fields, however no deer ever came out in either field to see it. I don't believe it discouraged deer, I just don't think any were in the area. Will try again next year
customer_reviews.author: Srlucky

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product the welding on the three pronged stand broke so I have been unable to use it. Looks like poor spot welding to me so please beware. However, the decoy itself seems to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sprayberry

customer_reviews.title: Get the Primos Wagging Tail
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to draw deer into the open field. The head doesn't move much at all even after I shaved off where the head rubs against the body. Wind does not move neither the tail nor the head. It's late season in SC. I am using it as a doe. I will update this if I can fool the deer into coming out. Rut is over at this time of year.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Alfakir

customer_reviews.title: Great decoy
customer_reviews.text: Hub LOVES this devoy. My dogs? Hated it! Hence it looked real to them. Tail is soft and moves as does the head. Not too heavy to haul. Easy set up in the woods. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Endrea

customer_reviews.title: As good as the best... for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great decoy. I've had alot of deer think it's real. Put some scent on the ground under it and keep him human scent free and you'll see. Shave the plastic on the inside of the body where the neck goes in to get better movement. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bushwhacker

customer_reviews.title: Life like!
customer_reviews.text: First. Awesome seller. Easy to put together,life like. Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Chadpoe

customer_reviews.title: Definitely there is an effect on deer! They were spooked!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. A little issues with the head getting stuck and not moving. Had to smooth some of the surface and works ok. Used it at the tail end of the rut in my area. Deer (both bucks and does) were spooked when they saw it. I will try to use it again next season but I was not impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ochillee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this decoy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this decoy. In the past I have used a 3-D target as a decoy, so am looking forward to using something that is easier to transport and set-up. Realistic looking and the head moves as advertised. Had some difficulty getting all the parts to fit in the body cavity, but after a few attempts I was able to accomplish this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It's no fun hauling this big guy around, but man does he ever work!
customer_reviews.author: Carl M Clore

customer_reviews.title: No head movement
customer_reviews.text: Sitting in 20 mph wind and the head hasn’t swayed once, I knew it wasn’t going to work when I first put it together, very poor design in that sense. Aside from that it’s still a good value decoy
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time hunting with a decoy. I removed the antlers and used it as a decoy with doe urine under the decoy. We set up about 50 yards away from the decoy. It didn't take long and bucks started to appear. One buck couldn't stand it and ran to the decoy, circled downwind and took a bug sniff. That was all the time my son needed for the shot. Even after the buck was on the ground, more bucks were looking at the doe decoy from the edge of the field. I have never seen anything like this before. If we had more tags we could taken deer all day long.
customer_reviews.author: NWwoman

customer_reviews.title: doe estrus boy got nice buck during rut
customer_reviews.text: Well it Lil heavy. We would leave it hid on property. Had alot deer check it out. Scared few Lil bucks. Removed horns put.doe estrus boy got nice buck during rut. Fixing by another.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer Auto Diesel

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: we got it quickly and it was what we expected no surprises so that was a plus. we have already used it and will defiantly be using it again. very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Brought in a buck...somewhat a pain to haul around. Really only for an evening sit as it can make decent noise if you're not paying attention or fumbling in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works nice
customer_reviews.text: didn't harvest any deer with this unit but hopefully next year.
customer_reviews.author: rrazz60

customer_reviews.title: had a lot of fun watching deer's reactions to this thing this year
customer_reviews.text: Works, had a lot of fun watching deer's reactions to this thing this year, had a small 6 point spend a hour trying to pick a fight with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bane S. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Decoy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked first time i put it out. A buck came at dusk; walked right up to it. My friend nailed it from my ground blind.
customer_reviews.author: M. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: did have to adjust the neck to head to fit but it works great and looks even
customer_reviews.text: Got way more with this decoy than you do with most, did have to adjust the neck to head to fit but it works great and looks even better
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great in the field. Head and tail move with the wind. Nice and sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mcalister

customer_reviews.title: I've enjoyed hunting with this decoy and it has pulled in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed hunting with this decoy and it has pulled in several bucks within bow range in the two seasons I have used it. The decoy is very realistic, lightweight, and easy to set up. My only problem with the product is that the bag provided for field carry of the decoy is too small! The result is parts of the decoy hanging out of the bag--sometimes falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very realistic, east to set up, not the easiest to put everything back in the decoys body, but what don't fit can go in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He came just as expected and looks pretty good I think.
customer_reviews.author: Richard long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great really brings in the deer takes the fear out of spoked deer
customer_reviews.author: tim darrenkamp

customer_reviews.title: The head does not move like they say you have to trim around the hole ...
customer_reviews.text: The head does not move like they say you have to trim around the hole where the head goes then it does move some but needs to be tried more should work fine and when u put the parts back inside it is really tight do have trouble getting the legs and head out other than that I like it
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The decoy is easy to set up, except for the antlers, they are a little difficult to insert into the holes. Also the instructions show that the entire decoy can fit inside of the body, I tried for around 30 min, I think its impossible without smashing and scratching up the decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The decoy is of great quality and the eyes are even good and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The decoy is of great quality and the eyes are even good and I didn't need to change them out. The base is cheesy and poorly designed and built, but it's easy to fix. Overall I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Realistic Decoy
customer_reviews.text: Great decoy. Primos customer service is Grade A. Yes I would recommend to a freind or family.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: It looked life like standing in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been using it during archery hunting. It looked life like standing in my backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Malexis

customer_reviews.title: It works, could have killed a mid size buck ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, could have killed a mid size buck on my 1st setup with my bow. It’s a little hard to pack and unpack. You will need to plan in advance when you use this it can be a little loud in the dark setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier...
customer_reviews.text: Expedited shipping arrived next day. Looks and functions great. Head and tail move even better than expected. Travel bag is a good size and the back legs and head twist right into the cavity for transport. The ground stake is very sturdy. 5 stars, I couldn't be happier that I made the decision to go with this decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Pichotta

customer_reviews.title: Great visual I wouldn’t use it with scents
customer_reviews.text: only Used it for one day and it brought in 2 spikes from across a field and they stayed around the decoy. Does we’re wary but still stuck around. Definite will use it way more next year
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kiouretzis

customer_reviews.title: It's well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made , but so far it has only scared away deer?
customer_reviews.author: Lee Scharr

customer_reviews.title: Great decoy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't complain. Sure the legs were a little scuffed but that was described.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Bell

customer_reviews.title: No luck this past season I'll try again this year ...
customer_reviews.text: No luck this past season I'll try again this year. Rather cumbersome to carry hard to level so head moves.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to put together. All parts will not fit into the body, so you have to carry the rear legs separately from the body in the carry sack. It draws bucks and does alike. I hope my neighbors aren't using it.
customer_reviews.author: Realtime

customer_reviews.title: Brings em in!
customer_reviews.text: Still tough to get in and out but looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to set up. Takes a bit to get it packed back up so pay attention when you pull all the pieces out the first time.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: The stand for it wasn't in the box. Had to build my own. Other than that it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great decoy! First 30 minutes out I had 3 mature bucks walk within 15 yards of it. One trick I learned was to have the head on the high side of a hill for a lot better head movement.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Best hunt purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best money I've ever spent. I used it for the first time yesterday and had 3 bucks come charging right for it. Never seen anything like it. It works !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty realistic. Shot a buck come in to it while using it as a doe decoy
customer_reviews.author: Wibuckhunter

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale so a really good value. Used it once with no luck but ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale so a really good value. Used it once with no luck but it looked good and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Miller10

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easy. The moving head and tail(wind aided)are a plus. The metal anchoring stand works well. Used it twice,each time a buck came in for a close look. Negatives: no way it fits in the storage bag,and packing the legs and head in the body cavity is challenging. Looked at other models and I rate this the best of the bunch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome just what I wanted a lot better then my boss decoy
customer_reviews.author: bobby blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Take some practice before using g with regard to packing up..only fits one way.
customer_reviews.author: joseph m. miles

customer_reviews.title: a good decoy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lifelike decoy. I bought it for my husband.He said he really needed it,but after he got it he found it difficult to carry. We joke about carrying scar,the steady stick,a backpack,the gun or bow. Scar spinds most of his time in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: realistic...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing... I bought it because most of my hunting is in thick cover and I need something to draw them out. First time I set it out a 10 point walked within 10 yards of it!!
customer_reviews.author: ryan newman

customer_reviews.title: Used this last year for hunting season. I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this last year for hunting season. I did not have any luck with it bringing in Deer but I plan on Using it again this season. I hunt and live on the same property so Most of the time I left it assembled and carried it out to the area I was hunting. It looks very real at first glance, or across the field or low light. If you set it up level the head will move when the wind blows. Most of the time I use it as a doe. Bow season starts this weekend. I will test it out again this year.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great decoy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify the ground stake height and the head clip ring to fit, but still a great decoy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: zach biggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The active movement of the head makes it look real
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to put together and take apart. Deer can't tell the difference. People complain about it not fitting in the bag.....learn how to put it back and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HUNTING DECOY
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic decoy! The tail being able to move as well as the head is amazing. I watched the movement as even the slightest breeze blew. You have to make sure you face it in the right direction and get it level; but this ie EASY with the supplied support. Very stable and extremely easy to assemble. The carry bag is a welome extra! The directions said you could place scent directly on the tail; but I put a zip tie on the support rod just under the decoy's belly. This let me hang a pad there and keep the decoy "sent free" for next year. Looking forward to bow season next year!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mel in Al

customer_reviews.title: Looks and moves like it should
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use this season! Looks and moves like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago N.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked incredibly well. Deer didn’t know it wasn’t real. Worked great!! One downside, the stand is basically garbage, made one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not great , too heavy but concept fine
customer_reviews.text: way too heavy to transport into woods, base attachment broke first time I used it!
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The ears were missing in the box. For this price I shouldn’t have to deal with missing pieces. Disappointing. Wanted it for a hunting trip that I’m leaving for soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine. A slight breeze made the head move
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for deer season. I assembled the decoy to see how it looked. It's fine. A slight breeze made the head move. That should add to the realism.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scareface is the excellent decoy
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped very fast, it is easy to assemble, it sets up rather quickly, the only thing i found was it is a little bit harder to put the parts back into the body cavity, but after doing this numerous times it gets a little easier. the first time i used this it did pull a smaller 8 pt into about 18 yds, having the large bag to carry this in is an A+, if you don't want to put every thing back in to the body, you can parcialy disasemble it and just stuff it in the bag for a quick relocate, i would give this a rating of 4+ out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: cuddly1958

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. I was able to get all the parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I was able to get all the parts back inside for transport. The head moves with the slightest breeze. I cant wait to try it out in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: At least it was not the head missing
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the tail which is a headache I'll have to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Danial Walker

customer_reviews.title: Realistic & Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I like this decoy. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because after removing the body parts from the cavity of the decoy, I can't see how anyone would be able to put them back inside. I even tried following the directions, and I still couldn't get them in the body. Otherwise, the realism of the decoy is great. I set it up in my backyard and my dogs thought it was real.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Arenz

customer_reviews.title: My husband had to do some minor alterations on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to do some minor alterations on the decoy to make it go together properly but now looks forward to Deer Season to try it in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works quiet well out in the pasture, especially when standing in some low brush, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hunter
customer_reviews.text: The product was well made and no trouble putting it together, and it is bringing a big buck in, just not close enough as of yet, Happy Hunting :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nob (Bon)

customer_reviews.title: deer decoy
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly, easy to put together, made reasonably well. Will be hard to put back in the same box as all parts do not fit easily within the body. I have tried it several times as a doe to try and drawin bucks. Several bucks were curious and stopped to gape at the decoy. Parts don't move in less than a 15 knot wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times and so far its brought something in everytime
customer_reviews.author: Briar Smith

customer_reviews.title: very good decoy, very best price.
customer_reviews.text: very good product. I got the best price and received it on the date promised, during the holidays! Cant wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: david depew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice.. easy to assemble way more heavy duty than i expected..head movement is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good decoy
customer_reviews.text: very life like fooled me a couple of times .
customer_reviews.author: sean Sampey

customer_reviews.title: I think he'll love it. Delivery was fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, I think he'll love it. Delivery was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Schwiterman

customer_reviews.title: No Tail
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I didn’t receive a tail in my package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: setting it up is easy. Put in the yard by house and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Not deer season yet. setting it up is easy. Put in the yard by house and have had deer come up to it and a small 7 pt buck decided he needed to challenge the decoy. It held up!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitetail43

customer_reviews.title: Deer decoy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I asked for!! I wasn't seeing any deer til I got this. I would recommend to all hunters
customer_reviews.author: susan w

customer_reviews.title: Great decoy need bigger carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the decoy, tail is lifelike and head moves. Very disappointed with the carry bag. Its only half the size of the decoy!
customer_reviews.author: fandalora

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It is everything its advertised to be. Be advised that it will likely scare off small bucks, so if you have this out you're trophy hunting exclusively. I didn't have any luck with it my first season of use. Had one doe come out and stomp her feet and get about 30 yards from it, but that's all the interest it generated for me. Jury is still out in my book. But it is and does what it's supposed to, so four stars on that. Maybe it should be five, but until I see it draw in a buck I can't go there.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: had it in the woods 2 days. love it
customer_reviews.text: I took this into the woods, had it there for two days, and absolutely loved observing deer react with it. Definitely worth the price. Only draw-back is the pieces do not fit inside of the cavity like they say they will. I could not get them into the cavity, without them sticking out!!
customer_reviews.author: mario k. mazzei

customer_reviews.title: Excellent decoy, mine was attacked 3 times last fall ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent decoy, mine was attacked 3 times last fall by mature bucks and I straightened out the metal frame and set it back out in a different locations. Had great action with this decoy and I plan on using it much more! Easy to assemble, easy to carry to the field, sets up quickly, the tail and head assembly move with the wind perfectly. Definitely gave me a hunting advantage and paid off well!
customer_reviews.author: SCOTTJAGODZINSKI

customer_reviews.title: Nice Decoy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been researching/ shopping for a "realistic" buck/ doe decoy for a couple years. I finally decided to purchase one this year. I'm glad that I chose "Scarface". First of all, it arrived ahead of schedule. I got the decoy out of the box and set it up. Everything included was as described. The decoy assembly and disassembly went smoothly. I did have a little trouble packing the parts into the body cavity. But, after reading the instructions again I was able to force all the parts back in. I will practice a few more times before I take it into the field. Overall a very good buy. Can't wait to test it during the pre-rut.
customer_reviews.author: B-Tex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scarface is an awesome decoy, bucks and dose come to it
customer_reviews.author: James Bender

customer_reviews.title: real
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for christmas and he loved it. It is really looks real from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic decoy! Would be even better if it could ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic decoy! Would be even better if it could walk to my stand by itself!
customer_reviews.author: code_mistress

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this decoy so far. Really like the head movement with the slightest breeze.
customer_reviews.author: steve cassman

customer_reviews.title: Works good at drawing in rutting bucks
customer_reviews.text: Works good at drawing in rutting bucks, The only negative thing i have to say is about he manufacturing, had to trim alot of material to get the head to move some what freely. I seen other reviews with the same problem. To put all the pieces in the body even with the instructed order is a joke, you may get them in but you will fight and work up a sweat getting them back out. For the price the manufacture could have done alot better job.
customer_reviews.author: Randall F.

customer_reviews.title: It brought bucks in and did not spook them!
customer_reviews.text: Loading it all up into the chest cavity sucks but I do not plan on taking it up mountains or difficult locations so it worked fine in the fields and open areas of the woods. It brought a buck in and it ate right next to the decoy without ever spooking.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: PRIMOS DECOY
customer_reviews.text: THE HEAD AN TAIL MOVE FREELY IN THE WIND AND MAKES IT LOOK LIFE LIKE. THE SUPPORT STAKE HOLD THE DEER IN PLACE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS DEER DECOY FOR OTHER HUNTERS.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon Kinney

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Got this decoy as a gift from my wife. It attracts deer every time I set it up. Does are interested from a distance & bucks either charge or walk up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The decoy seems to be durable and well constructed. It is light weight and well made. It is very difficult to fit all of the parts back inside the torso, but they all fit back in the carrying bag with ease. It does have to be perfectly level for the head to move and give it the realistic look, achieving this can be very difficult in the hills here in mississippi. However even without the movement from a distance it should be good enough to fool a deer. Overall I like the decoy very much, now I just have to find a big buck to see how he feels about it :)
customer_reviews.author: xray004

customer_reviews.title: Make it move for you..
customer_reviews.text: Just a tip if the tail doesn't move in the wind enough like mine didnt, tie a piece of clear fishing to it and run it to your stand/blind. You can then twitch the tail by flicking the line. If the head doesn't move try trimming the plastic around the head. I suppose you could try the fishing line with the head as well if you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SCSSTEVE

product_meta.title: Primos Scarface Decoy
product_meta.description: Primos has been trusted by individuals for decades. Products that are made of quality material and designed to withstand the toughest environments. Trust the brand that others in the field use and don't settle for less.
feature_bullets: Quality materials used for all Primos products
100% designed and tested for the toughest situations and environments
Whether you are a professional, recreational user, or even casual, Primos will fit the mold for all types of people
